          <title>
            <string language="en">Neutralisation of hydrochloric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neutralisation der Salzsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Neutralisation d'acide chlorhydrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neutralização do ácido hydrochloric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Neutralizzazione di acido cloridrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουδετεροποίηση του υδροχλωρικού οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Neutralización del ácido hidroclórico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the set up for the neutralisation of dilute hydrochloric acid by the addition of dilute potassium hydroxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrochloric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">neutralisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pH</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pipette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potassium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Set oben für die 
Neutralisation der verdünnten Salzsäure durch die Hinzufügung des 
verdünnten Kaliumhydroxids.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'installation pour la 
neutralisation de l'acide chlorhydrique dilué par l'ajout de 
l'hydroxyde dilué de potassium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o jogo acima para a 
neutralização do ácido hydrochloric diluído pela adição do 
hydroxide diluído do potassium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la messa a punto per 
la neutralizzazione di acido cloridrico diluito tramite l'aggiunta 
dell'idrossido diluito del potassio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την ίδρυση για την 
ουδετεροποίηση του αραιού υδροχλωρικού οξέος από την προσθήκη 
του αραιού υδροξειδίου καλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el conjunto para arriba
para la neutralización del ácido hidroclórico diluído por la 
adición del hidróxido diluído del potasio.</string>
          </description>
